description: Checks whether the image specified in a process creation event is not a full, absolute path (caused by process ghosting or other unorthodox methods to start a process)
name: Execution Of Non-Existing File
query: ((NOT (process.executable.text:*\\*)) AND (NOT ((NOT _exists_:process.executable.text) OR (process.executable.text:("\-" OR "")) OR (process.executable.text:("Registry" OR "MemCompression" OR "vmmem") OR process.command_line.text:("Registry" OR "MemCompression" OR "vmmem")))))
author: Max Altgelt
